title: The Photonic Tutor: The Adventures of Walter Carter

story.text: Walter Carter discovers his newfound ability to manipulate light while tutoring a student in physics, realizing he can project images from his own memories.
Intrigued by his powers, Walter experiments with them during a photography walk in the park, accidentally capturing the essence of the sunlight in his pictures.
A local bank is being robbed, and Walter uses his ability to blind the robbers with intense light, allowing the police to apprehend them safely.
Walter crafts special lenses that allow him to control and refine his powers more effectively, merging his passions for tutoring and photography.
He becomes a hero in his neighborhood, using his light projections to create spectacular visual lessons for students and transforming complex concepts into vivid, understandable imagery.
Realizing the potential of his abilities, Walter sets up a workshop for young aspiring photographers, teaching them not only about cameras but also about the physics of light.
His week culminates in a grand exhibition of photos captured and enhanced using his powers, attended by the community and showcasing his unique blend of science and art.

ending: Walter Carter realized that every day held a snapshot of opportunity, using his powers to enlighten and inspire.
moral: Harness your unique talents to illuminate the path for others.
